projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce solution built with React and Node.js, featuring user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A mobile application for task management with real-time synchronization, offline support, and intuitive user interface design.

projects.title: RESTful API Service
projects.description: A scalable REST API built with Express.js and PostgreSQL, featuring authentication, rate limiting, and comprehensive documentation.

projects.title: Social Media Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive social media analytics dashboard with real-time data visualization, user engagement metrics, and reporting features.

projects.title: Learning Management System
projects.description: An online learning platform with course management, video streaming, progress tracking, and interactive quizzes for educational institutions.

projects.title: Fitness Tracking App
projects.description: A comprehensive fitness application with workout tracking, nutrition logging, progress visualization, and social features for fitness enthusiasts.
